verse.verse_1: ALLAH IN THE NAME OF THE MOST AFFECTIONATE, THE MERCIFUL.
verse.verse_2: All praise unto Allah, Lord of all the worlds.
verse.verse_4: Master of the Day of Requital.
verse.verse_5: We worship You alone, and beg You alone for help.
verse.verse_6: Guide us in the straight path.
verse.verse_7: The path of those whom You have favored.Not of those who have earned Your anger and nor of those who have gone astray.
